\chapter{HOW DOES IT WORK?}
\label{\detokenize{overview:how-does-it-work}}\label{\detokenize{overview::doc}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
The BitByteRider RC car is powered by ESP32\sphinxhyphen{}C3 Breadboard \& Power adapter developmemt board.
